languageModelTools.name: copilot-actions_start-chat-agent
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Starts a new Copilot agent session in VS Code asynchronously with a given prompt. Returns a session ID to track the operation. Use markdown for the prompt.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Starts a new Copilot agent session with a given prompt. Returns a session ID.

prompt.description: The initial text prompt to place in the chat input.

languageModelTools.name: copilot-actions_complete_subaction
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Signals the completion or error of an asynchronous action initiated by another tool, using its session ID. Session ID is UUID.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Signals the completion of an asynchronous task.

sessionId.description: The session ID of the action to complete.

result.description: The successful result of the action (optional if error is provided).

error.description: An error message if the action failed (optional if result is provided).

languageModelTools.name: copilot-actions_check_action_status
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Checks the status and retrieves the result/error of an asynchronous action using its session ID. Session ID is returned by the `copilot-actions_start-chat-agent` tool and is UUID.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Checks the status of an asynchronous action using its session ID.

sessionId.description: The session ID of the action to check.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
